verses.name: Ezekiel 43:1
verses.text: Afterward he brought me to the gate, even the gate that looketh toward the east:

verses.name: Ezekiel 43:2
verses.text: And, behold, the glory of the God of Israel came from the way of the east: and his voice was like a noise of many waters: and the earth shined with his glory.

verses.name: Ezekiel 43:3
verses.text: And it was according to the appearance of the vision which I saw, even according to the vision that I saw when I came to destroy the city: and the visions were like the vision that I saw by the river Chebar; and I fell upon my face.
